1.0.1.name: wordpress/lighton
1.0.1.description:
LightOn is a lightweight monitoring tool for operationg system, webserver (lighttpd & apache) and database New in version 1.2: mysql monitoring and templates for own customizing The supported operating systems are Linux and MAC OSX, BSD will be also supported in a later version.

Windows aka os-joke from Redmond will not be supported.

ToDo: * Translation * Nginx Support * Cool Ajax stuff
